description: Translate text from one language to another. Supports 100+ languages with automatic language detection. Translations are cached for 7 days to improve performance. Supports HTML and Markdown format preservation.

text.description: The text to translate. Can be plain text, HTML, or Markdown.

target_lang.description: Target language code (ISO 639-1). Examples: 'en' (English), 'es' (Spanish), 'fr' (French), 'de' (German), 'ja' (Japanese), 'zh' (Chinese), 'ar' (Arabic), etc. See full list at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes

source_lang.description: Source language code (ISO 639-1). If not provided, language will be auto-detected. Use 'auto' for automatic detection.

format.description: Format of the text. 'text' for plain text, 'html' for HTML content, 'markdown' for Markdown content. Default: 'text'

preserve_formatting.description: Whether to preserve formatting (line breaks, whitespace, etc.). Default: true
